policy: SOURCE bank_txn SINK irs_form CONSTRAINT count(distinct bank_txn.txn_id) = 1 ON FAIL REMOVE
SOURCE bank_txn SINK irs_form CONSTRAINT min(bank_txn.txn_id) = irs_form.txn_id ON FAIL REMOVE
description: Ensure transaction IDs match between source and sink

policy: SOURCE bank_txn SINK irs_form CONSTRAINT not min(bank_txn.category) = 'meal' or irs_form.business_use_pct <= 50.0 ON FAIL LLM
description: Meal expenses must have business use percentage <= 50%
